Room.Name: Adlermann Way/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Adlermann Way and Hofton Avenue at the northwestern corner of the city, right outside the Observational Station.
Room.LongDescription: Hofton Avenue runs east from the intersection, running parallel to the northern City Walls, while Adlermann Way runs south, also running parallel to the western City Walls. To the north is the Northwestern Oceancrest Observational Station, a large, tall building allowing the guards to watch for early signs of an assult or invasion.
